name: IMVU Product File
summary: Learn about .CFL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CFL files can be created and modified using IMVU Previewer, a development tool for IMVU developers.

description: Product created for IMVU, an instant messaging program that allows users to build 3D characters as avatars; products include clothing for male and female characters, personal appearance features, pets, rooms, and furniture.
